  • Uses of Ray in elements

    Methods in elements that return Ray
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Ray Camera.constructRayThroughPixel​(int nX, int nY, int j, int i)
    this function gets the view plane size and a selected pixel, and return the ray from the camera which intersects this pixel
    Methods in elements that return types with arguments of type Ray
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<Ray> Camera.constructRaysThroughPixel​(int nX, int nY, int j, int i)
    this function gets the view plane size and a selected pixel, and return the rays from the view plane which intersects the focal plane

    a method that receive a ray and find all intersections of this ray with the shapes in this class

    method of checking if bounding region exists and if the ray intersections it, only ray value input.

    Function which checks if a ray intersects the bounding region
